title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Ambassador Oguntuase E. Kayode.

content.rendered:
Today, 7th February, 2024, the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience the Advocacy Group for the establishment of Nigeria- Benin Permanent Joint Commission led by its Chairman, Steering Committee, Ambassador Oguntuase E. Kayode.
The Group’s advocacy is hinged on having a permanent Joint Commission to advance and foster enduring and robust relations between Nigeria and Benin Republic.
